name: Fritzfon solarimage
info:
Show power and energy info on your fritzfone

#  Need to be "http in" (Get) node originated
#  string or number for calculations must be numbers
 - msg.info (if not provided clock will be shown)
 - msg.house (if not provided will get calculated)
 - msg.toHouse (if not provided will get calculated)
 - msg.solar
 - msg.solarPercent
 - msg.fromGrid
 - msg.toGrid
 - msg.car
 - msg.carPercent
 - msg.heatPump
 - msg.fromBattery
 - msg.toBattery
 - msg.batteryPercent
 - msg.outlet

 # Following only works with numbers:
 #  input unit 
 ## Override "Input unit" per data   
 msg.(var name)Unit   
 example: msg.houseUnit = "kWh"

 #  output unit
 ## Override "out unit" per data   
 msg.(var name)OutUnit   
 example: msg.houseOutUnit = "kWh"

# Rounding
## Round modes:
Round = no unnecessary zeros.  
To fixed = add zeros to fit selected decemals.

 # override Options
 - msg.solarMax
 - msg.label

meta.author: Tim Oberle
meta.desc: Show your current (solar) power information on your Fritzfon

name: Is string? + clock
If number then to string + rounding
kWh to €
Calculate house
calculate toHouse
% range
